author: mariohavel
content: <@&857649635274915900> Weekly standup call starting in 30 minutes. Join here https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup

author: mariohavel
content: Recording from the standup is ready. It was rather short today but full of great progress, thanks everyone! https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gCdSgM0sNyyeOTs9TJyWE2N5XgJDANqt/view?usp=sharing

author: .eagleedge
content: I just wrote up a detailed post on setting up and running your own Ethereum full node and Arbitrum node from scratch (hardware, operating system, software installation etc,) based on my own journey of the process last month. If anyone is interested, you can check out this post: https://hackmd.io/@EagleEdge/B1wnRW5Di I hope this will be helpful for anyone who is interested in running their own node.
